title: Oce pro scene is a joke, Only Corki the God wise words
body:
Got destroyed in wild card, couldn't even make semis, came 5th out of 8, and japan was basically trolling, so I'd say 5th out of 7.

Also if you believe Oce pro teams are even going to be a thing just take a look at SEA, they WON season 2 WORLDS and are now a wild card team LOL, and their SECOND PLACED TEAM Bangkok Titans played instead of their one that won cause of visa issues, and yet they still went 6 wins 1 loss in the tournament, I'm not sure how they got 3-0'd in the semis by the 4th ranked team considering they hadn't lost to them but they did, regardless my point, oce is doomed, forever. Turkey and Brazil are clearly better than us, and look how long Brazil has been trying to get taken seriously... huehuehue.

And btw, the only reason Oce pro scene get a salary pay in this shtty OPL that no one watched is because Riot knows that having a pro scene in oce will draw a lot more people to their game and the small salary they pay these pros (it's probably near nothing) is all made back in profit from the people addicted to the idea of becoming pro. (They just use the pro scene as advertising for their game, instead of paying for ad's they pay some kids to play at 'pro' level and it has a better affect then in your face shameless advertising since it makes people think Good Guy Riot supporting pro scene.

~Sincerely Only Corki the God

I remember "only corki"

he was the guy who had a boosted account in plat.. was too shit to maintain it so he played and streamed on his silver account which he also sucked balls playing, used to talk himself up on his stream like he was a god then gets put in the dumpster and tries and play it off LOL.. was such a dip $hit

Boosted wut? im plat 2 now 90 lp, i got demoted to gold v for start of season 5 and rose to plat 1 with ease, are u on drugs? Spreading false information about someones rank in league'd is always dat last resort fail argument when u know ur sht, mad cause ur servers sht LEL.

Problem? Of course Oce isn't the best yet. It's because of the same reason it costs a fkn lot to live here in Australia.. Do you know why, friend? BECAUSE EVERY  OTHER COUNTRY HAS MORE PEOPLE. MORE PEOPLE= MORE % THAT CAN BE PRO AT A GAME. MORE PEOPLE THAT PAY TAXES. MORE PEOPLE.

what does paying taxes have to do with anything you downie

Maybe add 1+1 together asswipe. If more people lived in Australia our taxes would go down. US has millions of people.. therefore more people paying taxes therefore each perso doesn't have to pay as much. Population involves everything. Oce isn't as good because there aren't as many people. In Us and Eu just on the factor of population alone: there is more chance of having more amazing pro league players like bjerg etc. If that is too hard for you to understand then don't hurt yourself. Don't get a job either cause you probably will fail at understanding that too.
